attributes.action: privatise the biased BBC and ensure it is no longer protected by an unpopular poll tax - end the licence fee by 2010
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The BBC is an institutionally biased broadcaster that no longer fulfils it's function in the digital age of consumer choice. It has been protected by an unpopular poll tax to champion views that are no longer relevant in the post-modern, post 7/7 21st century.

rejection.details: This petition overlaps with serveral already in existence, for example:  http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/bbcmonopoly/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
